name: Above the Horizon (Evelyn You, GGavin, Moulya Paramesh, QQQQQsc, WhistleWit)
name_original: Above the Horizon (Evelyn You, GGavin, Moulya Paramesh, QQQQQsc, WhistleWit)
description:
A Spicy Gang Game Overview:

Above the Horizon is a 3D third-person survival game. The main character, Pico, is a newbie sky pirate. Her purposes in this game are: to gather recourse to have herself and her ship fed, fight other sky pirates and take their base for more resources, and complete quests to increase the bounty value on her head.
